TopicTitle: Newb space administration eh... administrator, checking in

Articles.Content:
Hello there! New player stopping by to say hi while waiting for enough cash to purchase the latest version of the full game. I've been tinkering around with the demo and I must say, excellent work to the devs on this game!!

One quick question - what's with the ribbons I'm seeing in some forum members signatures?? I imagine they all mean something; anyone got a list or something for their meanings?

Welcome to the community Morokth

The ribbons are a fanmade thing, most people ribbons are also a link to the page explaining them, and they let the player show what planets and moons they have been to

They are totally optional, you might see a graphic depicting the planets and moons too, with places reached in colour while other places are blocked out, like unlit buttons.

A lot of info was lost when the forums crashed though, so I don't have links available for you sorry.

I hope you can get the game soon if you think the demos good the full game will be amazing!

Fly Safe
Thanks for the replies and vote of encouragement. Hope to see this purchase soon and maybe ill even have some tales to tell in the future!
